thoughts.text: The 'browse_website' command returned some useful information about new updates and events happening in the Subway Surfers game. We can use the 'write_to_file' command to write this information to a file so that we can refer to it later if needed.
thoughts.reasoning: The 'browse_website' command returned some useful information about new updates and events happening in the Subway Surfers game. We can use the 'write_to_file' command to write this information to a file so that we can refer to it later if needed. thoughts.plan: - Use the 'write_to_file' command to write the information returned by the 'browse_website' command to a file
thoughts.criticism: There is a risk of losing the file or overwriting it with new information, so we should be mindful of the file name and the location where it is saved.

args.text:
The text provides information about updates and events in the Subway Surfers game in the year 2022, including the release of new characters, hoverboards, and outfits, as well as re-releases of previous editions. Special events such as the Super Runner City challenge and the 10th Birthday celebration are also mentioned. However, the text notes that some characters have lost HD graphics and every edition will be unplayable.
